mapper.select: select TAPHOLEID, ITEMID, VALUE from IPLATURE.T_TS_TAPHOLE_PROPERTY where itemid ='2103' order by TAPHOLEID asc
select value as ironMouth from T_TS_TAP_VALUE where ITEMID = 2148 and TAPNO = (select TAPNO as furnaceNumber from t_ts_tap order by TAPNO desc fetch first 1 row ONLY)
select HOLENO, PROPERTYID, VALUE from IPLATURE.T_DV_DRAUGHT_PROPERTY_VALUE where PROPERTYID=(select PROPERTYID from IPLATURE.T_DV_PROPERTY where NAME= 'STATUS') order by HOLENO asc

select max(decode(ITEMID, 10, value, 0)) AS piliao, max(decode(ITEMID, 13, value, 0)) AS jiaotan, max(decode(ITEMID, 15, value, 0)) AS shaojie, max(decode(ITEMID, 17, value, 0)) AS qiutuan, max(decode(ITEMID, 18, value, 0)) AS PB, max(decode(ITEMID, 36, value, 0)) AS jiaobi, max(decode(ITEMID, 37, value, 0)) AS meibi, max(decode(ITEMID, 38, value, 0)) AS ranliaobi from (select value, itemid from IPLATURE.T_MW_CHARGE_VALUE where CHARGENO = (select max(chargeno) from IPLATURE.T_MW_CHARGE_VALUE) and ITEMID in (10, 13, 15, 17, 18,36, 37, 38) ) as ic

SELECT ${fieldStr},b.CLOCK FROM IPLATURE.${tableName} as a left join IPLATURE.T_CUTOFF_RESULT as b on a.RESULTID =b.RESULTID where b.CUTOFFID = 1
and b.CLOCK < TIMESTAMP(#{time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS.US')
order by a.resultId desc fetch first ${rows} rows only
SELECT ${fieldStr},b.CLOCK FROM IPLATURE.${tableName} as a left join IPLATURE.T_CUTOFF_RESULT as b on a.RESULTID =b.RESULTID WHERE a.RESULTID IN ${ResultIdStr} order by a.RESULTID desc

SELECT ${BlastFurnaceField},b.CLOCK FROM IPLATURE.${BlastFurnaceTable} as a left join IPLATURE.T_CUTOFF_RESULT as b on a.RESULTID =b.RESULTID WHERE a.RESULTID IN ${HeatMapResultIdStr} order by a.RESULTID asc

SELECT layer.CHARGENO, layer.BASEH, layer.LEVEL, layer.THICK, layer.POINTX FROM BENGANG.T_MD_BODY_MAT_LAYER layer WHERE 1=1
and layer.CLOCK = #{clock}
and layer.CLOCK = (SELECT MAX(CLOCK) FROM BENGANG.T_MD_BODY_MAT_LAYER)
ORDER BY LEVEL ASC

SELECT LAYER.CHARGENO AS "chargeNo", LAYER.LEVEL AS "level", LAYER.THICK AS "thick", LAYER.C_THICK AS "cThick", LAYER.O_THICK AS "oThick", LAYER.FLAG AS "flag", INFO.CHARGENO AS "chargeNo", INFO.THEO_FE AS "theoFe", INFO.THEO_SLAG AS "theoSlag", INFO.COKE_RATIO AS "cokeRatio", INFO.COMPRE_COKE_RATIO AS "compreCokeRatio", INFO.R AS "r", INFO.COKE_TOTAL AS "cokeTotal", INFO.CHARGE_WGT AS "chargeWgt" FROM BENGANG.T_MD_BODY_MAT_LAYER LAYER LEFT JOIN BENGANG.T_MD_BODY_CHARGE_CAL_INFO INFO ON LAYER.CHARGENO = INFO.CHARGENO WHERE LAYER.CLOCK = (SELECT MAX(CLOCK) FROM BENGANG.T_MD_BODY_MAT_LAYER) ORDER BY LEVEL ASC
SELECT ANGLEID, SUBSTR(DESCR , LOCATE(':',DESCR)+1 , LENGTH(DESCR)) AS ANGLE, DESCR FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_ANGLE WHERE ANGLEID NOT IN (101,102,103,1001)

SELECT VC.CALCID as "calcId" FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_CALC VC WHERE 1 = 1
AND VC.STARTDATE = #{startTime}
AND VC.STARTDATE = (select max(STARTDATE) from IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_CALC)
AND VC.ANGLEID = (SELECT ANGLEID from IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_ANGLE WHERE DESCR = #{angleValue}) order by CALCID desc fetch first 1 rows only

SELECT TVP.R, TVP.Z FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_POLYGON_POINT TPP LEFT JOIN IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_POINT TVP ON TPP.POINTID =tvp.POINTID WHERE TPP.POLYGONID = ( SELECT TVP.polygonid from IPLATURE.t_md_er_value_polygon tvp where tvp.calcid = #{calcId} and tvp.polygontype = (select t.polygontype from IPLATURE.t_md_er_polygon_type t where t.polygonkey='ER_POLYGON_MW') ) ORDER BY tpp.POLYGONID, tpp.SEQ

SELECT tvp.R, tvp.Z FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_POLYGON_POINT tpp LEFT JOIN IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_POINT tvp ON tpp.POINTID =tvp.POINTID WHERE tpp.POLYGONID = ( select tvp.polygonid from IPLATURE.t_md_er_value_polygon tvp where tvp.calcid = #{calcId} and tvp.polygontype = (select t.polygontype from IPLATURE.t_md_er_polygon_type t where t.polygonkey='ER_POLYGON_W') ) ORDER BY tpp.POLYGONID, tpp.SEQ

select '标高' || high as dispname, high from (select cast(tt.z as decimal(5,3)) as high from (select distinct t1.z from IPLATURE.t_md_er_point t1 where t1.pointtype = 6) tt where tt.z <= (select t.defval from IPLATURE.t_md_er_calc_parameter_setup t where t.keyname = 'PAR_ER_COOLWALL_Y_MAX') and tt.z >=(select t.defval from IPLATURE.t_md_er_calc_parameter_setup t where t.keyname = 'PAR_ER_COOLWALL_Y_MIN')) t4 order by high desc

SELECT
t1.Z AS "height" ,
t1.r + 0.1 - t.val AS "radius", ROUND ( ( SELECT DISTINCT angle FROM IPLATURE.t_md_er_couple a, IPLATURE.t_md_er_couple_point b WHERE a.coupleid = b.coupleid AND b.pointid = t1.pointid ), 0 ) as "angle" FROM IPLATURE.t_md_er_value_wall_point t, IPLATURE.t_md_er_point t1, IPLATURE.t_md_er_value_group t2 WHERE t.POINTID = t1.POINTID
AND t.ITEMID = #{itemId} AND t1.POINTTYPE = 6 AND t.GROUPID = t2.GROUPID
AND t2.STARTDATE = #{startTime}
AND t2.STARTDATE = (SELECT TIMESTAMP(MAX(STARTDATE))-1 DAY FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_GROUP)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.POINTID, t.ITEMID, t.GROUPID, t1.POINTTYPE, t2.STARTDATE, t1.Z AS "height" , t.val AS "radius", ROUND ( ( SELECT DISTINCT angle FROM IPLATURE.t_md_er_couple a, IPLATURE.t_md_er_couple_point b WHERE a.coupleid = b.coupleid AND b.pointid = t1.pointid ), 0 ) as "angle" FROM IPLATURE.t_md_er_value_wall_point t, IPLATURE.t_md_er_point t1, IPLATURE.t_md_er_value_group t2 WHERE t.POINTID = t1.POINTID AND t1.Z = #{high} AND t.ITEMID = #{itemId} AND t1.POINTTYPE = 6 AND t.GROUPID = t2.GROUPID
AND t2.STARTDATE <=#{startTime}
AND t2.STARTDATE <= (select max(STARTDATE) from IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_GROUP)
) subquery WHERE (#{angle} IS NULL OR subquery."angle" = #{angle})
AND subquery.STARTDATE >= date((select max(STARTDATE) from IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_VALUE_GROUP) - 1 month)
ORDER BY subquery.STARTDATE DESC
FETCH FIRST ${rows} ROWS ONLY

select point.hight/1000 as "height", point.angle as "angle", value.width/100 as "radius" from IPLATURE.T_MD_WR_POINT_VALUE value,IPLATURE.T_MD_WR_POINT point where value.pointId = point.pointId and value.width is not null and value.clock =(select max(clock) from IPLATURE.T_MD_WR_POINT_VALUE)

select
POINT.R, POINT.Z from IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_POINT POINT where POINTID in ( select POINTID from IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_POLYGON POLYGON, IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_POLYGONPOINT POLYGONPOINT where V_POLYGON = '11' and polygontype='1' and POLYGON.POLYGONID = POLYGONPOINT.POLYGONID group by POINTID )

SELECT TP.POLYGONID, TM.REMARK, TPO.R, TPO.Z FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_POLYGON TP LEFT JOIN IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_MATERIAL TM ON TP.MATERIALID = TM.MATERIALID LEFT JOIN IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_POLYGONPOINT TPP ON TP.POLYGONID = TPP.POLYGONID LEFT JOIN (SELECT POINTID,R,Z FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_POINT T WHERE V_POINT = (SELECT V_POINT FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_ANGLE WHERE ANGLEID = #{angleId})) TPO ON TPP.POINTID = TPO.POINTID WHERE TP.POLYGONTYPE = 1 AND TP.V_POLYGON = (SELECT V_POLYGON FROM IPLATURE.T_MD_ER_ANGLE WHERE ANGLEID = #{angleId}) AND TP.USING IN (2,3) ORDER BY TP.POLYGONID,TPP.SEQ
